EmailTemplate.description: Auto Response to Team Buy Voucher Redemption form ---Delete after June 2011
EmailTemplate.name: Team Buy Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for contacting us
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey there! We have received your request to redeem your voucher and you will hear from us in the next 2 businiess days with the information and options for your trip. The deadline is fast approaching, so please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions.
Thanks
Charles Roberts Director of Programs, Absolute 905 777 1662 (866) 432 4464
